text: This was a new event to the ITF Women's Circuit. İpek Soylu won the title, defeating Anastasija Sevastova in the final, 7–5, 3–6, 6–1. == Seeds == == Main draw == === Finals === === Top half === === Bottom half === == References == * Main draw Bursa Cup - Singles 2015 Singles
title: 2015 Bursa Cup – Singles
